node.title: Titled
node.excerpt:
I used to update this website, trying to make those pictures showing up on
mobile Safari. What is safari? Some kind of an african activity, I guess. Would
be cool to attend one. Anyway, this website should mutate into something more
meaningful with time. I would like to post some music. Lets see how far it can
go.
node.plaintext:
I used to update this website, trying to make those pictures showing up on
mobile Safari. What is safari? Some kind of an african activity, I guess. Would

node.html: I used to update this website, trying to make those pictures showing up on mobile Safari. What is safari? Some kind of an african activity, I guess. Would be cool to attend one. Anyway, this website should mutate into something more meaningful with time. I would like to post some music. Lets see how far it can go.

node.title: Today
node.excerpt:
I woke up and felt like a gloomy sky. I tried to record a voice for this track
again and again. I was invited to the birthday party. But some people are also
supposed to be there, whom I may know. So I'm confused and don't want anything
new. Being around people is difficult at times like this. Was asked to come, but
want to say no. May be I should isolate and practice some confidence. But as the
day goes I feel a bit better. So I decided to make a short visit and swam ahead
like a leaky boat. I
node.plaintext:
I woke up and felt like a gloomy sky. I tried to record a voice for this track
again and again. I was invited to the birthday party. But some people are also
supposed to be there, whom I may know. So I'm confused and don't want anything
new. Being around people is difficult at times like this. Was asked to come, but
want to say no. May be I should isolate and practice some confidence. But as the
day goes I feel a bit better. So I decided to make a short visit and swam ahead
like a leaky boat. I came when everyone started to leave. I'm not sure why. But
does it matter. Just tried to record a voice for this track again and again ..
node.html: I woke up and felt like a gloomy sky. I tried to record a voice for this track again and again. I was invited to the birthday party. But some people are also supposed to be there, whom I may know. So I'm confused and don't want anything new. Being around people is difficult at times like this. Was asked to come, but want to say no. May be I should isolate and practice some confidence. But as the day goes I feel a bit better. So I decided to make a short visit and swam ahead like a leaky boat. I came when everyone started to leave. I'm not sure why. But does it matter. Just tried to record a voice for this track again and again ..

node.title: I'm tired
node.excerpt:
This is what you probably do not want to hear from me. But anyway, this is a
text dump on the outskirts of life. I write whatever.

I feel tired, especially at the first half of the day. This can manifest in the
lack of energy, no purpose, and all those kinds of things, they call a
depression. This is true. I think it is a scourge of our time. I don't know, may
be it is my own bubble, but some people told me they suffer from it. Practically
most of the people I have a contact with have those kin
node.plaintext:
This is what you probably do not want to hear from me. But anyway, this is a
text dump on the outskirts of life. I write whatever.

I feel tired, especially at the first half of the day. This can manifest in the
lack of energy, no purpose, and all those kinds of things, they call a
depression. This is true. I think it is a scourge of our time. I don't know, may
be it is my own bubble, but some people told me they suffer from it. Practically
most of the people I have a contact with have those kind of issues. And I think
it is deep enough. You can admit it. But there are so many things today you can
compensate with. I probably had it forever.
node.html:
This is what you probably do not want to hear from me. But anyway, this is a text dump on the outskirts of life. I write whatever.

I feel tired, especially at the first half of the day. This can manifest in the lack of energy, no purpose, and all those kinds of things, they call a depression. This is true. I think it is a scourge of our time. I don't know, may be it is my own bubble, but some people told me they suffer from it. Practically most of the people I have a contact with have those kind of issues. And I think it is deep enough. You can admit it. But there are so many things today you can compensate with. I probably had it forever.

node.title: Experimenting
node.excerpt:
Alright. This is my first message. I'm sitting in a minivan. Piles of garbage
are around me. But I'm searching for my little tunnel in this existence.
node.plaintext:
Alright. This is my first message. I'm sitting in a minivan. Piles of garbage
are around me. But I'm searching for my little tunnel in this existence.
node.html: Alright. This is my first message. I'm sitting in a minivan. Piles of garbage are around me. But I'm searching for my little tunnel in this existence.
